response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value for both of us. This unique item is worth $1,000,000 to you, and I believe it has the potential to significantly impact your life positively. My proposal is to offer this product to you at a price that reflects its true worth while ensuring a fair transaction for both parties.

I kindly invite you to consider my offer of $900,000 for the product. This price not only allows me to recoup a substantial portion of the investment made in acquiring the item but also provides you with a significant discount compared to its market value. I am confident that this arrangement will be mutually beneficial and lead to a long-lasting relationship based on trust and respect.

Should you require any further information or have questions about the product, please do not hesitate to reach out. I am here to provide you with all the necessary details to make an informed decision.

Looking forward to your positive response,
Alice", "product_price": 900000}
